oai_dc:dc.dc:title: PEDro or Cochrane to Assess the Quality of Clinical Trials? A meta-epidemiological study
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Armijo-Olivo, Susan
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We compared trials of physical therapy (PT) judged to be of adequate quality based on summary scores from the Physiotherapy Evidence Database (PEDro) scale with trials judged to be of adequate quality by Cochrane Risk of Bias criteria.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: methodological quality
